## SearchHeadless.setUniversalAutocompleteLimit() method

Sets [UniversalSearchState.autocompleteLimit](./search-headless.universalsearchstate.autocompletelimit.md) to the specified limit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setUniversalAutocompleteLimit(limit: number | undefined): void;
```
